# allowedDynamicRange

**Instance Property**

The allowed dynamic range of the image, or nil to mark that the dynamic range of the image should be unrestricted. This property defaults to `sdr`, i.e. HDR content will be tone mapped to SDR.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final var allowedDynamicRange: Image.DynamicRange? { get set }
```

## Accessing renderer properties

- **proposedSize**: The size proposed to the root view.
- **scale**: The scale at which to render the image.
- **isOpaque**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the alpha channel of the image is fully opaque.
- **colorMode**: The working color space and storage format of the image.
